original_title: Dialog Enhances 5G Roaming, Now Covering 70 Countries and 150 Global Mobile Operators
original_body_lines: Dialog Axiata PLC, Sri Lanka’s #1 connectivity provider, has expanded its 5G roaming footprint to 70 countries in collaboration with 150 global mobile operators – reinforcing its commitment to delivering seamless mobile connectivity and high-speed data access for Sri Lankan travellers, whether flying for business or leisure.

Building on its 2023 milestone of enabling 5G roaming across 50+ countries with 100+ mobile operators, Dialog continues to extend its global reach. With support for speeds of up to 1 Gbps, the expanded network ensures that customers with 5G-compatible devices enjoy fast, reliable connectivity wherever they travel – reflecting Dialog’s ongoing efforts to innovate and lead in telecommunications.

This development builds upon Dialog’s leadership in South Asia’s 5G landscape, which began in 2018 with the first demonstration of 5G capabilities in the region. Today, Dialog’s 5G roaming network stands among the most extensive in the region, delivering an enhanced experience for customers on the move.

“At Dialog, we are proud to extend our 5G roaming services to 70 countries and 150 mobile operators globally, further solidifying our position as a leader in technological innovation,” said Lim Li San, Group Chief Operating Officer of Dialog Axiata PLC. “Our commitment to providing seamless, high-speed connectivity for our customers remains unwavering, and this milestone underscores our mission to deliver a world-class mobile experience, whether at home or abroad.”

Dialog remains dedicated to enhancing the mobile experience by expanding its 5G roaming footprint and ensuring the best in global connectivity and performance. For more information on roaming, visit https://www.dialog.lk/roaming/4g-5g-country-list.
